register.information_is_empty: To complete the registration, you need to enter your name and date of birth.

weight.weight_empty: To continue, you need to enter your weight.
weight.enter_range: Please enter a valid weight in the range of 25-635.

dialog.progress_lost: Are you sure? All your progress will be lost.
dialog.general_error: An error occurred. Please try again.

onboard.onboarding_1: This app is designed to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and help you track your weight and BMI values.
onboard.onboarding_2: We don't store your data, so there's no need to worry about your privacy.
onboard.onboarding_3: You can create separate profiles for your family members and track their BMI values. If you prefer, you can skip these steps and go straight to calculating your BMI.
onboard.onboarding_4: You can export your results to back up your data. As long as your backup file is safe, your data will never be lost.
